altTitles.en: I Don't Trust My Own Sister
I Don't Trust My Twin Sister

description.en:
The richest woman in the world, Laurentia Aztana, had success in both work and beauty, but her life was unhappy. She discovered that the illness of her sister, Erusia, was a complete lie, and that she was cooperating with her fiancé to buy all of her possessions. It was a treacherous story of betrayal.

At the moment Laurentia was forced to turn her back on her pain and remorse, she had gone back eleven years before her engagement. Her faith in Erusia, her affection for her fiancé; all of it could go to hell. Listen carefully, Sister, there is no good sister now. I pledge to redesign my life.

The first thing is, I’m tied up with a national hero who cannot possibly deal with the tr*sh left in the past. Oh, the debt that you took unfairly, I’ll fix it. Instead, become my marriage partner.

title.en: Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusenmochi Datta node, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei toshite Jiyuu ni Ikitai

altTitles.en: When I Woke Up, I Got the Strongest Equipment and a Starship, so I Went and Became a Mercenary in Order to Live as I Please while Aiming for a Detached House

altTitles.ja: 目覚めたら最強装備と宇宙船持ちだったので、一戸建て目指して傭兵として自由に生きたい

altTitles.en: Reborn as a Space Mercenary: I Woke Up Piloting the Strongest Starship!

altTitles.zh: 一觉醒来坐拥神装和飞船，我决定以买一套独门独户的房子为目标作为佣兵自由地活下去

altTitles.zh-hk: 覺醒起來就持有最強裝備和宇宙飛船，所以我決定以買一個私人住宅為目標作為傭兵自由地活下去

altTitles.ru: Я очнулся, будучи пилотом сильнейшего космического корабля, а потому решил стать межгалактическим наёмником

description.en:
Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceship–one that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, he’s going to make the most of his good luck and create the life he’s always dreamed of!


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/reborn-as-a-space-mercenary-i-woke-up-piloting-the-strongest-starship-light-novel/)
description.ru: Это история о парне, неожиданно оказавшемся в открытом космосе с личным боевым кораблем. На этом космолёте он будет путешествовать, попутно спасать девушек, оказавшихся в беде, флиртовать с ними, зарабатывать деньги и использовать свои знания из игры, чтобы вести свободный и непринужденный образ жизни.

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en: Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.

Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?

In a world where people suddenly develop super-powers, those who use their abilities to do evil are held at Catastrophe Prison. Shu Ono, a guard at the prison, somehow falls in love with the strongest female prisoner, Lava! A crazy love-comedy about the forbidden relationship between guard and prisoner!
description.es-la: Un mundo en el que las personas desarrollan repentinamente habilidades diferentes. Los que utilizan sus habilidades para hacer el mal son encarcelados en una prisión de catastrófica. Shu Ono, que trabaja allí como guardia, se enamora de algún modo de la prisionera más fuerte, ¡Lava!

description.en: The story is set in 1983, our protagonist Nanami Hatano is a music-loving teenager who dreams of moving to England to follow the punk musicians she idolizes, but instead has to deal with her grandfather who squanders the family's money to buy antiques. Nanami is inspired by the real life of the author.

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en: After a mission gone awry, the doubtful main character, Rood, is sent to a famous magic school, Helios. Here, he must protect an important person's son who has a very bad time at the school. (from mangaupdates)
description.pl: Zaraz po ważnej misji, główny bohater mag Rood zwany Czarnym Czarodziejem, wbrew swojej woli zostaje wysłany do sławnej szkoły magicznej, Helios. Ma tam zająć się ochroną ważnej osobistości, która ma problemy ze szkolnym życiem. Okazuje się jednak, że to nie jego jedyne zmartwienie.

altTitles.zh-ro: Ai Yu Sha Yi Zhi Ye

altTitles.en: Night of Love and Murderous Intent

description.en: A decade ago, he was a beta at the pinnacle of his assassin career. But one day, while trying to save an Alpha child, he suffered severe injuries leading him to lose the sharpness and insight an assassin needs. Left with no choice, he retired and moved into a remote small town to start a new life under a new identity. Everything was going well until an unexpected visitor showed up at his house. The child he had saved years ago has now grown into the leader of an organization, and he’s coming after the beta with a powerful intent—

Kinokura Gen loves camping solo. He enjoys the quiet solitude away from the hustle and bustle of the city, and being able to appreciate nature all by himself. But on one camping trip, his solitude is broken by the appearance of Kusano Shizuku, a young woman who wanted to go solo camping by herself, but is ill-prepared and completely out of her league. While he tries to to get her to go home so he can camp in peace, she refuses, and stubbornly insists on accompanying him on future camping trips until she's ready to camp solo. Thus Gen and Shizuku's days of solo camping together begin.

**Note**: "Part 1" concluded in February 2023 with 3 extra chapters due to start in April as the series is moving magazines from Kodansha Evening to Kodansha Morning.

The series resumed its publication in December 2023.
description.es: A Kinokura Gen le encanta acampar solo. Disfruta de la tranquila soledad lejos del ajetreo de la ciudad, y de ser capaz de apreciar la naturaleza por sí mismo. Pero en un viaje de campamento, su soledad se ve interrumpida por la aparición de Kusano Shizuku, una joven que quería ir sola a acampar, pero está mal preparada y completamente fuera de su alcance. Mientras él intenta que ella regrese a casa para poder acampar en paz, ella se niega, y tercamente insiste en acompañarlo en futuros viajes de campamento hasta que esté lista para acampar sola. Así comienzan los días en que Gen y Shizuku acampan juntos…
description.ja: オレは樹乃倉厳。34歳。趣味はキャンプ。独りで野営する生粋のソロキャンパー。車はいらない。電車を乗り継ぎ、最後はバスで山に入る。自然を愛してる、火を木を水を土を。それと同等に孤独な自分の生き方を愛している――。…な俺が！　ひょんなことから草野雫20歳という小娘に出会い、ふたりでソロキャンプをするはめに！

description.en:
"We're pretending to be lovers, right...?" "Let's break up."

Akira Watase is dating his best friend, Fumiya Watari. But it's all a camouflage! In order to keep girls away, Akira is playing the role of Watari's lover, who's famous among the female students at school. Watari even kissed him to prove it to the girls!? Akira was depressed, saying that his youth is completely over, but for some reason, he keeps pretending they're dating...?

(Source: Ichijinsha, translated)

altTitles.en: Meimei Xiaoshi de Di Yibai Tian

description.en: I killed my younger sister and managed to get away with it. But on the 100th day after her death, something strange happened…
description.tr: :||Kız kardeşimi öldürdüm ve suç üstüme yıkılmadan mükemmel bir şekilde kaçtım. Ama ölümünden 100 gün sonra sıra dışı bir olay gerçekleşti…||

title.en: A Returner's Magic Should Be Special

altTitles.ja: 帰還者の魔法は特別です

altTitles.zh-hk: 重生者的魔法一定要特別

altTitles.th: พลังขั้นเทพของจอมเวทจุติใหม่

altTitles.es: La magia de un retornado debe ser especial

altTitles.vi: Ma thuật đặc biệt của phù thủy quay ngược thời gian

altTitles.pt-br: A Magia de um Retornado Tem de Ser Especial

description.de:
"Jetzt, wo ich zurückgekehrt bin, werde ich keinen meiner Liebsten wieder sterben lassen!" Das Labyrinth der Schatten - die tödlichste Katastrophe, der die Menschheit jemals gegenüberstand. Desir Arman, einer der sechs Überlebenden der Menschheit, befindet sich im Labyrinth. Die sechs versuchen gemeinsam, die letzte Prüfung des Labyrinths zu meistern, scheitern aber, woraufhin die Welt untergeht. Aber als sich Desir gerade auf sein Ende vorbereitet, erscheint plötzlich vor ihm die Welt … von vor 13 Jahren?! Desir ist in die Vergangenheit zurückgekehrt, in eine Zeit, als er Schüler an der besten Magierschule seines war. Er und seine Liebsten wurden wieder vereint, und er ist entschlossen, dieses Mal sie und die Welt zu retten! Es bleiben noch drei Jahre bevor die Schattenwelt erscheint! Ändere die Vergangenheit und versammle mächtige Kameraden um dich, um die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en:
"Now that I'm back, I won't allow my loved ones to die again!"  
  
The Shadow Labyrinth - the deadliest catastrophe humanity has ever known.  
Desir Arman, one of the six remaining survivors of mankind, is inside the Labyrinth. The six of them attempt to clear the final level of the Labyrinth but ultimately fail, and the world comes to an end.  
However, when Desir thought he would meet his demise, what appears before him is the world… thirteen years ago?!  
  
Desir is returned to the past, back to the time when he enrolled at the nation's finest magic academy, Havrion. He is reunited with his precious friends, and he is determined to change the past to save the world and his loved ones…!  
  
Three years remain before the emergence of the Shadow World!  
Change the past and gather powerful comrades to save mankind!

description.fr:
Le monde est au bord de la destruction après une guerre dévastatrice de dix ans dans le « Labyrinthe des ombres ». Desir Herrman est l'un des derniers magiciens restants, mais il n'est pas assez puissant pour combattre l'ennemi fatal qui menace l'Humanité. Alors qu'il est certain que la fin est proche, il est renvoyé dans le temps, à l'époque où il étudiait la magie à la prestigieuse Académie Hebrion ! Grâce à cette seconde chance, Desir est bien décidé à sauver non seulement sa peau, mais également celle de ses amis et camarades perdus. Sachant déjà ce que le futur leur réserve, ses efforts pourront-ils faire la différence, ou bien seront-ils tous condamnés à revivre le même destin tragique ? Adapté du roman phare.

description.id:
"Agak disesalkan, tapi sebaiknya kita bersia-siap untuk mati!"
"Apa dunia akan benar-benar berakhir di sini?!"

Desir mengira semua sudah berakhir. Namun, ternyata dia kembali ke ujian masuk akademi hevrion 13 tahun yang lalu! Ia kembali berkumpul dengan orang-orang tercinta yang mati dalam dunia bayangan. Tiga tahun tersisa sebelum dunia bayangan muncul! 

"Kesempatan datang lagi, aku tidak akan kehilangan orang-orang yang kucintai untuk kedua kalinya!"

description.ja:
人類が迎えた最悪の災害、影の迷宮。 「デジール・アルマン」は影の迷宮の中で最後まで生き残った生存者6人のうちの1人である。 彼らは影の迷宮の最後のボスに挑戦したが、失敗し、世界は滅亡を迎えてしまった。 全てが終わったと思った瞬間、「デジール」の目の前に見える光景は…13年前の世界！？ 帝国最高の魔法学院、へブリオン学園の入学式に戻ってきた「デジール」 最悪の災害「影の世界」発生までの残りの時間は3年！ 過去を変え、強い仲間を集めて、世界を救えることはできるだろうか！

description.ko:
"다시 돌아온 이상, 사랑하는 사람들을 두 번 잃을 순 없어!"

인류가 맞이한 최악의 재앙, 그림자 미궁.
데지르 아르망은 미궁 속에서 
마지막까지 살아남은 최후의 생존자 6명 중 한 명이다.
그들은 그림자 미궁의 마지막 단계에 도전하지만 결국 실패하고
세계는 멸망을 맞이하고 만다.

모든 게 끝이라 생각했던 순간,
데지르의 눈앞에 펼쳐진 것은 다름 아닌 13년 전의 세상?!

제국 최고의 마법 학원, 헤브리온에 입학했던 순간으로 돌아온 데지르.
그림자 미궁에서 잃었던 소중한 사람들과 재회하게 되고,
사랑하는 사람들과 세상을 구하기 위해 과거를 바꾸고자 하는데…!

그림자 세계 발생까지 남은 시간은 3년!
과거를 바꾸고, 강한 동료를 모아 세상을 구원하라!

description.ru:
"Теперь, когда я вернулся, я не позволю дорогим для меня людям снова умереть".
Лабиринт Теней – главная катастрофа для человечества за всю историю его существования.
Дезир Арман – один из шести выживших людей.

Шесть попыток зачистить последний уровень лабиринта потерпели полную неудачу, и теперь мир близится к концу.
Однако, когда Дезир готовится встретить свою кончину, то, что открывается перед ним – это мир... 13 лет назад?!

Дезир возвращается в прошлое, когда он только поступил в самую престижную магическую академию магии в стране – Хаврион. Он вновь воссоединился со своими дорогими друзьями и готов изменить прошлое, чтобы спасти этот мир и тех, кто ему дорог.

Остались три года до появления Теневого Мира! Измените прошлое и соберите могущественных товарищей, чтобы спасти человечество!

description.vi:
Desir vật lộn trong Mê cung bóng tối suốt 10 năm dài đằng đẵng, chứng kiến đồng đội và bạn bè lần lượt ngã xuống, mãi đến khi toàn đội cả trăm người chỉ còn vỏn vẹn 6 người thì mới đánh bại được kẻ thù chung. Những tưởng đã cứu được thế giới khỏi nguy cơ diệt vong, nào ngờ tai họa bất ngờ ập đến cuốn trôi tất cả mọi thứ. Lần nữa tỉnh lại, Desir phát hiện mình đã quay ngược thời gian trở về ngày đầu nhập học ở Học viện Hebrion. Liệu lần này anh có thể bảo vệ những người mình thương yêu và cứu vớt thế giới không?

description.zh-hk:
「既然已經回來了，
就不能再次失去心愛的人們!」

人類正面臨最可怕的災難——影之迷宮。
戴基爾．阿曼德是迷宮裡最後的6名倖存者之一。
他們試圖挑戰迷宮的最後關卡，
然而卻以失敗告終，
世界最終走向滅亡。

當以為一切已經結束的那刻，
戴基爾卻回到了13年前的過去?!

當時的戴基爾正要進入帝國最強的魔法學院——
赫布里溫學院就讀，
並且與在迷宮中逝去的珍貴夥伴們重逢。
為了拯救他心愛的人們與這個世界，
他決心要改變過去...!

距離影之世界出現的時間只剩3年了!
快召集強悍的同伴一同拯救世界吧!

title.en: Re:Zero Kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu – Hyouketsu no Kizuna

altTitles.en: Re: Life in a Different World Starting From Zero

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活 氷結の絆

altTitles.ru: Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире: Ледяные узы

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- The Frozen Bond

description.en:
Covered in ice and snow, Elior Forest is the home to dangerous magical beasts and 50 elves frozen in ice. One day, the great spirit Pack helps a young girl break out of her ice prison. Her name is Emilia, a half-elf born with silver hair, long ears, and amethyst eyes—features that resemble the evil Witch who destroyed half the world long ago.  
Shunned by society because of her appearance, Emilia dwells in the forest with Pack as her sole companion and family. Burdened with a sin of destruction she does not remember committing, she spends her days trying to find a way to help her frozen kin. But when the great spirit Melakuera, the Arbitrator of the world, finds Emilia, her right to stay alive is brought into question. Will the bonds of ice she formed with Pack prove to be the warm thread that defies fate?
description.ru: Приквел основной истории «Re: Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире». Прошло немало времени с тех пор, как Эмилия пробудилась ото сна посреди незнакомого заснеженного леса. Осознав, что ничего не помнит о прошлой жизни, девушка начинает учиться жить с нуля. В этом ей помогают её новые знакомые: Пак — немного странный, но очень заботливый и добрый Великий дух, встретивший Эмилию сразу после пробуждения, и молчаливые Младшие духи, помогающие ей в повседневности.
description.es-la: En lo más profundo del aislado Gran Bosque de Elior, una tierra helada cubierta de nieve y hielo, vive una niña temida por su parecido con la legendaria Bruja de los Celos. Es la semielfa Emilia, y su única compañía es un espíritu felino llamado Puck. Ambos están animadas por el deber y la culpa, pero nunca llegan a acercarse. En este mundo, los días parecen una eternidad inmutable, pero las pruebas que les esperan son despiadadas como el fuego del infierno...

description.en:
Tights… are to be worshipped! Tights… are the universe! Tights have infinite possibilities!  
High schooler first year at the height of his youth · Uechi Daia · was suffering.  
"I'm not distracted by my thoughts, but by that girl's tights! I don't want people to know how bad it is."  
  
Girls wearing tights are too cute! The inevitable comedy begins!  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/gggrande)
description.pt-br: Meias calças... são divinas! Meias calças... são universais! Com uma meia calça, as possibilidades são infinitas! O primeiranista do ensino médio, Uechi Daia, que está passando pela puberdade está sofrendo. Existe uma coisa que ele não consegue tirar de sua mente... Ele está sempre com esta tal preocupação em sua mente... Essa preocupação sendo as meias calças de uma garota!! Porém ele não pode deixar ninguém descobrir este tal probleminha dele... Mesmo assim estes tais pensamentos não saem da mente dele... Sobre a tal meia calça daquela garota!! Pois é, este jovem foi acertado pela sua puberdade... E com isso se inicia uma comédia romântica de um jovem e seu fetiche por meias calças!!

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

title.en: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Appmon Academy!!

altTitles.ja: アプリモンスターズ アプモン学園！！

description.en: Appli Monsters: Appmon Academy!! is a manga spin-off of Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters, focusing on the Appmon in a school setting.

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

description.en: Yue Zhishi and Song Yu are not blood related brothers, Yue Zhishi, who was fostered by the Song family since childhood, loves to cling to his older brother, Song Yu, who is three years older than him. However, Song Yu always deliberately maintains a distance. Song Yu, the brother who pretends to be indifferent, and Yue Zhishi, the brother who is a clingy little puppy. But what others don't know is that he understands his own heart, he choose to exercise self-control and maintain a distance because… Yue Zhishi is Song-Yu’s only allergen.

title.en: Midara na Ao-chan wa Benkyou ga Dekinai Otona-Hen

altTitles.ja: 淫らな青ちゃんは勉強ができない オトナ編

description.en: Ao-chan's delusion of H explodes because her father is a sensual novelist. Although it is a kiss end with my lover's wooden mallet, I will stay in the same apartment in Fukuoka at the same time as entering university! At last I thought that indecent days would begin … Aochan's mother appeared! ? A little adult, dimension stop Icha love life! A blockbuster, a long-awaited sequel! !

description.en:
In a world where manga can be enjoyed forever…
Manga culture has been able to blossom thanks to the power of manga lovers.
However, right now, manga is suffering because of piracy.
We need your help.

(Source: [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/blog/stop-piracy/))

---

**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Sukima](https://www.sukima.me/book/title/BT0000818522/)
- Alternative Official English - [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/blog/stop-piracy/) (Note: Last page of each chapter is missing)
description.es:
En un mundo donde el manga se puede disfrutar para siempre...
La cultura del manga ha podido florecer gracias al poder de los amantes del manga.
Sin embargo, ahora mismo, el manga está sufriendo a causa de la piratería.
Necesitamos tu ayuda.
description.ja:
いつまでも漫画を楽しめる世の中に 漫画を愛するみなさまの力で
漫画文化は花開きました。
しかし、今、漫画は海賊版に苦しんでいます。
みなさまの力が必要です。
まずは、下の「漫画」を読んでみてください。
漫画の未来を一緒に創りましょう！

description.en: The stories of the everyday life of a black mage and a slime that run a magic store together as master and servant.

"You wanna play rugby together?"

Arashi is a hot-blooded first year high school student enrolled on a rugby scholarship. Calling himself "the man who stirs up a storm", he unites a peculiar group of problem children, leading them towards the peak of high school rugby, the Hanazono! A youth rugby club story told by the delinquent manga legend, Yanauchi Daiju!

In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change,  high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living.  Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city.  He thought he would "just" keep on living like that. 

Until he met her. 

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead? 

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

description.en: A manga where nothing happens because neither characters can give into the other.
description.ja: 互いにタチを譲れなくてなにも始まらないBLまんが。

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.ja: オオカミαさんとオオカミΩくん

description.en: Ookami, who works in a high-class restaurant, is a rough-and-tumble guy who calls himself an alpha. He is given the job of educating a newcomer, Akko Ookami, who is not motivated or pretty, but because of her continuous failures, he is forced to take joint responsibility. But he suddenly loses consciousness... and when he realizes, Ookami, who is actually a super-aggressive alpha, rapes him in her most outrageous form and reveals her true identity as an omega! What will happen to the twisted relationship between the disguised alpha and the disguised omega?

title.en: Female Knight and the Kemonomimi Child

altTitles.ja: 女騎士とケモミミの子

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna Kishi to Kemomimi no Ko

altTitles.en: The Female Knight and the Beast-Eared Child
Female knight and the Kemonomimi child

description.en: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia, a female knight, lives with her apprentice Noah, an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up, adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.
description.ja: 魔物が蔓延り殺伐とした異世界。女騎士オリビアは、弟子の獣人ノアと暮らしていた。強く生きる2人の絆に癒され、キュンとする師弟の成長冒険譚

title.en: Beneath the Surviving Princess' Joyful Façade

altTitles.en: Behind the Laughter of the Surviving Princess

description.en:
"Very good. I shall give you my beloved sister, whom I cherish dearly."

Eric Chladnie, who led the long war to victory against the Shidate Principality, received the mandate to marry a foolish princess as a reward for his triumph.

After the wedding ceremony, Eric returned to the mansion with the newlywed princess. Amidst the princess's eccentric behaviour, his father attempts to kill her and his mother advices him to not give his heart. Only he, treating her like a child, respects and cherishes her as his wife. However, who is this woman who, in front of the king, impersonates deeds that she has never done and acts piously?

altTitles.en: The Greatest Sect Leader of All-Time

description.en: All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots, and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!
description.fr: Ma quête est de développer une secte qui serait un foyer chaleureux pour ses membres. Dedans, non seulement le chef de secte est amusant (ouais c'est moi) mais les disciples sont excentriques, aux personnalités très variées. Ils ont comme particularités d'être en constante évolution et d'être anormalement forts. Tous se révèlent être des gros bonnets, et moi, leur patriarche, je deviendrai invincible ! Approchez, les enfants, rejoignez ma secte et ensemble nous réaliserons vos rêves !

description.en:
Akira's older brother, Atsushi, has been missing for two years.   
  
One day, a mysterious woman who seems to know Atsushi's last known whereabouts appears and offers to take him and his friends there : to the island of Higanjima.   
  
Thus the great Man vs Vampire epic begins…
description.pt-br: O jovem promissor Atsushi desaparece deixando toda a sua responsabilidade como "filho perfeito" recair sobre seu irmão Akira. Dois anos se passam e agora Akira e seus leais amigos se deparam com uma pista do paradeiro de Atsushi, mas junto com a pista e a bela jovem que a traz está um monstro com força descomunal, olhos vermelho-escuro e cabelos brancos sedento por sangue. O que teria acontecido a Atsushi? Será que Akira e seus amigos conseguirão sobreviver para descobrir?

description.en: On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.
description.ru:
В день, когда мастер кендо Шихо решает всё бросить и помочь своей матери-одиночке в управлении небольшим ресторанчиком, он узнаёт о том, что его младшая сестра Шиён, которая училась в университете Сеула, покончила с собой. 
Во время похорон Шихо замечает кое-что странное. 
Чтобы узнать правду и отомстить за смерть сестры, Шихо снова берёт в руки уже знакомый меч и начинает свою собственную войну.

description.en: Six members of the occult circle will spend a few days at a ruined love hotel during their summer vacation. Upon arrival they meet two additional people who join them, but in the morning of the second day, a female member was found tied & naked. In addition, the exit was locked by someone and the building became a completely enclosed cage. Will this be a repeat of the 'kodoku' that happened 3 years ago?

altTitles.ja: 禁断師弟でブレイクスルー
禁断師弟でブレイクスルー～勇者の息子が魔王の弟子で何が悪い～
禁断師弟でブレイクスルー~ボーイ・ミーツ・サタン~

altTitles.ja-ro: Kindan Shitei de Breakthrough ～ Yuusha no Musuko ga Maou no Deshi de Nani ga Warui ～
Kindan Shitei de Breakthrough: Boy Meets Satan

altTitles.en: A Breakthrough Brought by Forbidden Master and Disciple
Breakthrough with the Forbidden Master: So What If the Hero's Son Is the Demon King's Disciple
A Breakthrough Came out by Forbidden Master and Disciple

description.en:
The hero's son and the ghost of the Demon King are the master and pupil!?  
  
Eirth, the son of the hero who defeated the Great Demon King, is troubled.  
Always expected to achieve great things, but unable to meet those expectations.  
No matter the effort he puts in, and the results he obtains, it's never enough for them.  
"I'm a disappointment compared to my father" or "Don't you know you're the son of the hero!!"  
Living every day like this, Eirth meets his destiny in the room containing the sword of his father, the hero.  
  
"Interesting. I will train you. I have only free time now.”  
  
Eirth receives special personal training from the Demon King just to get back at his parents and the world.  
In the coming days, his parents, the heroes of the past, his first love, the princess childhood friend,  
the geniuses of the era, and the world will tremble before him.
description.pt-br: O filho do herói virou discípulo do espirito do rei demônio!? Eirth, filho do herói que derrotou o grande rei demônio se encontra em conflito. Sempre esperam grandes feitos dele, mas ele nunca consegue cumprir com as expectativas. Não importa quanto esforço ele coloque, o resultado nunca satisfaz aqueles ao seu redor. “Sou uma falha comparado ao meu pai” ou “Você não é o filho do herói?” E vivendo todos os dias assombrado por expectativas desta forma, Eirth finalmente tem um encontro destinado na sala da espada sagrada de seu pai. “Interessante, eu irei treiná-lo. Tenho bastante tempo livre agora.” Assim, Eirth começa a receber um treinamento especial do rei demônio para surpreender seus pais e todo mundo. Todos estão prestes a tremer diante dele!

description.en:
I, Leticia Violet, was devoted to my husband, but I lost everything. Just as she is about to lose her life, a man appears in her life. He promises to help me achieve the perfect revenge...

"When you say you'll help me get my revenge... please honor your word."

To those who brought me to my death, I will give back all that I have received.

---
When Letitia Winchester faces death at the hands of her husband’s mistress, fate intervenes. She’s fished out of the river by Prince Sion, the first “Sol” born in a holy empire in 300 years. Using his divine powers, he changes Letitia’s appearance and gives her the new identity of Countess Anarose Victoire. Armed with divine powers and a thirst for revenge, the two form an unlikely alliance. Prince Sion seeks justice for a fallen friend, while Letitia plots retribution against those who wronged her.

Together, they embark on a journey of vengeance and redemption.

Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
description.es-la:
Errante, imponente, en algún lugar del vasto vacío espacial, Rendezvous espera! La única estación espacial construida dentro de un ser vivo, que aloja a los mejores científicos, guerreros, exploradores e ingenieros de la galaxia.
Sigue las aventuras de un grupo de Rendezvaj contra su mayor enemigo; La Federación de “Conservación” de la raza Mapache en esta épica ópera spacial.

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijou no Naka no Hito ~Danzai sareta Tenseisha no Tame Usotsuki Heroine ni Fukushuu Itashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の中の人〜断罪された転生者のため嘘つきヒロインに復讐いたします〜

altTitles.zh: 恶役千金的真面目～为被定罪的转生者向骗子女主报复～

altTitles.zh-hk: 惡役千金的真面目～為被定罪的轉生者向騙子女主報復～

altTitles.ja: Akuyaku Reijou no Naka no Hito

altTitles.vi: Kẻ Cư Ngụ Bên Trong Ác Nữ

altTitles.fr: La fille au sein de l'antagoniste
Celle à l'intérieur de la vilaine

description.en:
In order to clear the name of 'Emi,' a girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess' revenge to begin!
description.id:
Agar bisa membersihkan nama "Emi", yaitu nama seorang gadis yang bereinkarnasi menjadi Remilia sang villainess dari sebuah game otome, Remilia asli yang selama ini mengawasi emi dari dalam akhirnya telah tersadar.

Sekarang adalah waktunya bagi sang villainess yang asli untuk membalaskan dendamnya!

altTitles.ja-ro: 可愛くないね、後輩くん

description.en:
"You're really not cute!!!"  
  
Akutsu is still only an underclassman but he's got all the girls' attention. Plus, not only is he good in his studies, he's also the ace of the baseball club.  
  
Even though Ida doesn't want have anything to do with Akutsu but somehow they're often together…?  
  
Don't tell me he actually likes me!?

title.en: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンクエスト ダイの大冒険 勇者アバンと獄炎の魔王

altTitles.ja-ro: Dragon Quest: Dai no Daibouken - Yuusha Avan to Gokuen no Maou

description.en: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan! Another heroic story begins now!

title.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: 私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

description.en: Kuroki Tomoko is a super popular, high school girl, who has had 50 years of dating experience, and 100 boys… in the Otome game world. In the real world, she is a 15 year old loner, who has all of the qualities of a "mojo." However, when school isn't going as she expected, and she isn't as popular as she had thought she was, she takes a look at herself in the mirror for the first time in a few years, and has some shocking revelations…
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.

altTitles.en: You Who Can't Touch Me Anymore

description.en: In their high school days Shiraishi would tease her classmate Arashi constantly always touching his shaved head. Now, many years later, Shiraishi finds herself enthralled with a rising celebrity that she sees on TV an in magazines. This celebrity being none other that Arashi, her former classmate, now with long grown out hair. She wanders the streets hoping that by some happenstance she might once again meet him and be able to tell him the things she's kept in her heart for so many years. A tale of lost opportunities and love separated by time...
description.ja: 昔触りまくっていた坊主頭の同級生が芸能人に…

title.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.

altTitles.th: ALTAIR ดาวจรัสฟ้า อินทรีถลาลม

altTitles.vi: Sao Thiên Ưng trên bầu trời Tướng quốc

description.en:
For generations the Torqye Pashalu and the Balt-Rhein Empire have stood in stern opposition of each other. Then one night, when an Imperial minister is found assassinated, the two nations are plunged into a potentially explosive situation. As the generals of Torqye's council cry for war, Mahmut comes to discover the devious truth behind the assassination. Thus the young pasha's battle for his country and peace and trust in his fellow man begins…  

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10291/episode/324757) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/altair-a-record-of-battles/)

**Notes:**
- Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Awards in the shounen category.

altTitles.ja: 君のラブを見せてくれ！

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiàng wǒ zhǎnlù nǐ de ài

description.en: Komichi Shijou, the most famous person at her school, was troubled. Despite being a romantic comedy manga artist, she had no understanding of 'the feeling of love' was stuck in a creative slump. One day, a certain boy and girl appear before her. With their arrival, Komichi Shijou's investigation into 'genuine love' begins…!?
description.ja: 学校イチの有名人・四條恋路は悩んでました。なぜならラブコメ漫画家なのに、彼女には“恋する気持ち”がまったくわからず、スランプになってしまったからです。 そんな彼女の前にひと組の男女が現れます。その男女との出会いにより、彼女・四條恋路による“ホンモノの恋”への探求が始まるのでした…！？『恋愛』を綴る天才漫画家少女はホンモノの“恋”を知らないーー！？

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

---

Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even…‽

description.ja: 童貞高校生のゴトウが好きになったのはセックス大好きなギャル・アガワさん。ある日の放課後、彼女が同級生とセックスしているところを見てしまって──。
description.vi: Con đũy tình yêu đã dẫn nam chính của ta đi thích một gyaru lẳng lơ sẵn sàng làm nháy với bất cứ ai. Rồi anh main sẽ làm gì trước cái tình huống NTR nhưng không hẳn này? Khuyến cáo ko dành cho trẻ dưới 18 và các thanh niên không thích NTR. Đọc truyện này đừng lắp đầu trên vào làm gì (lắp đầu dưới thì OK).
description.es-la: Un virgen estudiante de secundaria, por casualidad descubre a la gal de la que se estaba empezando a enamorar teniendo sexo con otro estudiante.
description.pt-br: Uma Gal safada que deixa todo mundo transar com ela e um garoto virgem do ensino médio apaixonado por ela, mesmo depois de vê-la transar com seu colega de classe.

description.en: Mie is a dull high school student who happens to be a professional manga author. He hires an assistant, but the person who came is the number one gal in his class! Despite her looks though, she's extremely good at what she does, and working with her is exciting, stimulating, busy, and fun!!
description.fr: Mie est un lycéen ennuyeux qui se trouve être un mangaka professionnel. Il engage une assistante, mais la personne qui arrive est la plus grande gal de son lycée ! Malgré son physique, elle est extrêmement douée dans ce qu'elle fait, et travailler avec elle est excitant, stimulant, prenant et amusant !
